talk.utter: Politics have always been merged with religion... based in it actually.

talk.author: did:plc:kaadgatf6opidxgwmg34ewr4

talk.author: did:plc:jcfykltjsugz4jylflr4vlft

Now, don't get me twisted. You can practice or not practice any religion you want. 

Being based in religion does not equal having a mandatory religion
